alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 9:41PM EST until January 20 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 11 inches. * WHERE...Lake, Geauga, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute on Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread snow will overspread the region late tonight, with the heaviest snow expected during the day Friday. This will transition to lake effect snow Friday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
